thread.section_title: Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Delightful hotel in the heart of Stellenbosch
thread.title_full: Delightful hotel in the heart of Stellenbosch - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Elinor C
title: Delightful hotel in the heart of Stellenbosch
text: We had an wonderful stay from start to finish. Staff were all lovely, elegant rooms, beautiful furnishings, comfortable bed and the best breakfast. We took up a couple of suggestions from the hotel for activities (Bites and Sights, and Bikes and Wines - would recommend both) and we felt we made the most of our short stay.
